lead_paragraph: Liz O'Connell is a professional horsewoman who works at Anstu Farm in Millbrook, N.Y. She is a member of the New York State Task Force on Retired Race Horses and is active in rehoming off-the-track thoroughbreds. She is a graduate of Cornell University's College of Agriculture and Life Sciences.
snippet: Paddy O'Prado is running in the Breeders' Cup Classic after all. According to Iowa-based Donegal Racing's managing partner Jerry Crawford, the decision was well thought out.

headline.main: Paddy O'Prado to Make an Appearance

abstract: Paddy O'Prado is running in the Breeders' Cup Classic after all. According to Iowa-based Donegal Racing's managing partner Jerry Crawford, the decision was well thought out.
